item.title: Amazon is selling a $367 4K dash cam with 'razor-sharp video quality' for only $110
item.description: It offers impressive quality at a great price.

item.title: An airline just canceled all flights for 36 hours
item.description: All inbound flights are canceled from the evening of Sept. 23 through the morning of Sept. 25.

item.title: Tylenol parent Kenvue stock bounces back after White House assault
item.description: On Sept. 22, the White House linked acetaminophen, Tylenol's active ingredient, to autism and ADHD.

item.title: Walmart's bestselling $150 Adirondack patio rocking chair is on sale for $64
item.description: Shoppers call it "a great looking chair!"

item.title: BLS delays key consumer spending data as trust questions grow
item.description: Economists warn that credibility is at risk from Main Street to Wall Street.
